com.fr.funrungame.view.Screens

Class OptionsMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.fr.funrungame.view.Screens.OptionsMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FinishMenu, PauseMenu

    public abstract class OptionsMenu
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    Class that handles the background and title for the PauseMenu and FinishMenu.
